Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.examples.simulation

Class PhilosopherState

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.examples.simulation.PhilosopherState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public final class PhilosopherState
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The PhilosopherState class maintains the information about the state of a dining philosopher.
